machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;This start extruder gcode comes from CuraByDagoma
;Commented for now as there is discussion regarding its usage in Ultimaker Cura
;Start T1
;G92 E0
;G1 E-{retraction_amount} F10000
;G92 E0
;G1 E1.5 F3000
;G1 E-60 F10000
;G92 E0

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
;This end extruder gcode comes from CuraByDagoma
;Commented for now as there is discussion regarding its usage in Ultimaker Cura
;G92 E0
;G1 E{retraction_amount} F3000
;G92 E0
;G1 E60 F3000
;G92 E0
;G1 E-{retraction_amount} F5000
;End T1
